exercises.title: Stop planking at the table...
exercises.name: Full plank
exercises.description: The plank is a bodyweight exercise which involves holding the trunk part of your body in a straight line off the ground. The static exercise engages multiple muscle groups at the same time which makes it extremely effective at strengthening your core, whilst also working the shoulders, arms and glutes.

exercises.title: Stop planking at the table...
exercises.name: Elbow plank
exercises.description: The plank is a bodyweight exercise which involves holding the trunk part of your body in a straight line off the ground. The static exercise engages multiple muscle groups at the same time which makes it extremely effective at strengthening your core, whilst also working the shoulders, arms and glutes.

exercises.title: Let's jump!
exercises.name: Jumping jacks
exercises.description: Jumping jacks are a great conditioning exercise performed from a standing position by jumping to a position with legs spread and arms raised and then jumping back to the original position.

exercises.title: Mindfulness and Meditation, Ohmmmmmm...
exercises.name: Meditate
exercises.description: Meditation is a practice where an individual uses a technique – such as mindfulness, or focusing the mind on a particular object, thought, or activity – to train attention and awareness, and achieve a mentally clear and emotionally calm and stable state.

exercises.title: Push me up!
exercises.name: Push ups
exercises.description: Push up is a conditioning exercise performed in a prone position by raising and lowering the body with the straightening and bending of the arms while keeping the back straight and supporting the body on the hands and toes.

exercises.title: Up and go!
exercises.name: Run... Or walk
exercises.description: Running is a method of terrestrial locomotion allowing humans and other animals to move rapidly on foot. Running is a... Huh, you know what running is...

exercises.title: Sit some more...
exercises.name: Sit ups
exercises.description: Sit up is a conditioning exercise performed from a supine position by raising the torso to a sitting position and returning to the original position without using the arms or lifting the feet.

exercises.title: Move your legs
exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: A squat is a strength exercise in which the trainee lowers their hips from a standing position and then stands back up. During the descent of a squat, the hip and knee joints flex while the ankle joint dorsiflexes; conversely the hip and knee joints extend and the ankle joint plantarflexes when standing up.
